'''Pietro''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|Hunched on his hands and knees, quivering and drenched in sweat, the pirate lets out a pain-filled groan.}}

Pietro's ship was attacked by pirate hunters, which led him to swallow Ngati's Black Tear, a gemstone the size of his fist, to protect it. It lodged itself in his gut, making the poor pirate grow desperate to get it out.
